scripts.clean: lerna clean --yes; lerna run clean --parallel; shx rm -rf ./test-results
scripts.rebuild: yarn run clean; yarn run build;
scripts.watch: nodemon -e ts,js,json,env -i dist/ -i tests/ -x 'yarn run rebuild'
scripts.release: lerna publish -m 'chore(solution): publish new version to npm' --exact --conventional-commits --yes
